Develop a mobile app that allows users to track their carbon footprint and suggests ways to reduce it.
Create an interactive website where visitors can learn about the science behind climate change and take quizzes to test their knowledge.
Host a series of public lectures featuring renowned scientists and experts in the field of climate change.
Organize a community-wide clean-up event to remove trash and debris from local waterways and beaches.
Launch a social media campaign to raise awareness about the impact of climate change on vulnerable communities around the world and encourage people to take action.
